thread.title: Manchester City charged by the Football Association in regards to anti-doping rules
thread.title_full: Manchester City charged by the Football Association in regards to anti-doping rules

author: Jacob Murtagh
title: Manchester City charged by the Football Association in regards to anti-doping rules
text:
Manchester City are in hot water (Photo: UEFA/Getty Images) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester City have been charged by the Football Association in regards to anti-doping rules. 
A FA statement said: "Manchester City have been charged in relation to The FA’s Rules on Anti-Doping. 
"It is alleged the club failed to ensure that their ‘Club Whereabouts’ information was accurate, contrary to Regulation 14(d). 
"City have until 19 January 2017 to respond to the charge." 
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
